articles.content: A general view of the Legislative Council meeting debating a Beijing-backed electoral reform in Hong Kong, China, June 18, 2015. REUTERS/Bobby YipHong Kong's legislature passed on Wednesday a controv… [+3876 chars]

articles.author: Ben Popken
articles.title: Pandemic-ravaged restaurants can soon tap a $29B grant program - NBC News
articles.description: A new $28.6 billion restaurant fund will provide grants to the restaurant industry hit hard by pandemic.
articles.content:
Pandemic-ravaged restaurants can tap a new government grant program starting Monday.
The $28.6 billion Restaurant Revitalization Fund, run by the Small Business Administration and authorized as part… [+3988 chars]

articles.author: Gustavo Henrique Ruffo
articles.title: Ford Changes Its Mind, Opens Ion Park To Produce Own Battery Cells - InsideEVs
articles.description: After saying it would not make its own batteries to have a competitive edge, Ford changed its idea – and its CEO – by presenting Ion Park.
articles.content: We dedicate the song below to Ford. It would fit perfectly if it used the word "CEO" instead of "day," especially because it actually took seven months. On September 2, 2020, Fords former CEO Jim Hac… [+1728 chars]

articles.title: Apple deal comes with clear winners – and clear losers – for Triangle, economists warn - WRAL Tech Wire
articles.description: There will be clear winners and losers, as well as a hard-to-predict set of spillover effects of Apple's announced new Triangle facility, economists say.
articles.content: While the Triangle may benefit from the modeled benefits such as the direct jobs, the spillover ones in linked industries, and the induced ones, places far from the Triangle may not benefit, A projec… [+9895 chars]
